NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: I have dedicated what little time I have left to studying and understanding the deadly matter that has stolen the lives of all I hold dear... as well as its source.
2
1
CASSAVA: I was able to recall a shuttle to complete the expedition that Poke, Pye and Clary gave their lives to.
3 2
CASSAVA: My suspicions have been confirmed by their findings... Yet, more questions have been raised than answered.
4
3
CASSAVA: Was this structure naturally formed, or was it artificially created? How could it maintain such incredible pressures within itself for so long?
5
4
CASSAVA: To produce and maintain such pressures, artificial gravity could theoretically produce an inward force strong enough to create a consistent source of pressure...
6
5
CASSAVA: Suppose one were to craft a vessel composed of gravity crystals pointing towards a central point. If I were to use the comet as a model for this structure...
7
6
CASSAVA: All of a sudden, I feel exceedingly... inspired.
DSS EX1 1
DSS EX2 1
INSP R2 6
INSP EX4.5 6
